text:
AppNeta | Full-Stack Developer, Operations Engineer, Test Automation Engineer, Product Manager | Vancouver, Canada | https://www.appneta.com/

AppNeta is a fast-growing, international technology startup that has achieved 100% year-over-year sales growth and is poised to take advantage of the massive performance monitoring marketplace sized by Gartner as $3.5B in 2017. AppNeta has been named to the Inc. 5000 Fastest-Growing Private Companies list four years running, and has won numerous awards in the Boston market, including BBJ’s Best Places to Work and BostInno’s Coolest Companies.

All Positions: http://grnh.se/n7iu5g1

* Full-Stack Developer ( http://grnh.se/e1k3s21 ): JavaScript, React, NPM, gulp.js, Browserify, Ember.js

* Operations Engineer ( http://grnh.se/uqf36d1 ): AWS, Chef, Consul, Packer, Linux

* Test Automation Engineer ( http://grnh.se/uml3wd1 ): Java, Python, Selenium, bash, Git

* Product Manager ( http://grnh.se/67evbl1 )

Disclaimer: URLs include referral IDs for a referral bonus, you are welcome to strip the ID out if you prefer.
